entry.title: Get Ready!
entry.content:
1. Please fill out this quick Google Form no later than July 9th. Youâ€™ll be working with a partner in this class and I want to make it as easy as possible for you to find a like-minded / like-located one.
  2. Re-read the syllabus to get the required books and materials. Show up to the first class prepared to interview, sketch, and make lo-fi prototypes.
  3. Be ready to discuss a site or interaction experience you think is great, and one you use daily or weekly, and why.
